description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. You can create the universe! Starting with nothing but the four basic earthly elements, you can mix and match them to create newer, more advanced ones! With over 80 unique elements, Alchemy God is sure to engross you in the world you create.
description.short: You can create the universe! Starting with nothing but the four basic earthly elements, you can mix and match them to create newer, more advanced ones! With over 80 unique elements, Alchemy God is sure to engross you in the world you create.
